pr_title: Enable Shutdown of NSS and CryptoManager

timeline.bodyText: Needs a comment about what we're doing here.
timeline.author: cipherboy

timeline.bodyText: Instead of "unsafe" should we call it forceClose() or something like that?
timeline.author: edewata
